text: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

translation.en: But when We removed the punishment from them until a term which they were to reach, then at once they broke their word
translation.id: Tetapi setelah Kami hilangkan azab itu dari mereka hingga batas waktu yang harus mereka penuhi ternyata mereka ingkar janji
